fields.name: surveyID
fields.title: SurveyID
fields.description: The identifier of the Survey that the Site Visit is related to in this dataset.

fields.name: siteID
fields.title: Site ID
fields.description: Corresponds to a unique site identifier, provided within accompanying survey_site_data.csv template.

fields.name: siteIDSource
fields.title: Site ID Source
fields.description: The organisation that assigned the SiteID to this Site

fields.name: existingBDRSiteIRI
fields.title: Existing BDR Site IRI
fields.description: Corresponds to a unique site IRI, provided within accompanying survey_site_data.csv template.

fields.name: siteVisitID
fields.title: Site Visit ID
fields.description: The unique key assigned to a visit. A visit is a time distinct assessment conducted within a survey at a designated site.

fields.name: siteVisitStart
fields.title: Site Visit Start
fields.description: The temporal start of when the Site was being used to collect data for the survey. Expected values include date, dateTime, dateTimeStamp.

fields.name: siteVisitEnd
fields.title: Site Visit End
fields.description: The temporal end of when the Site was being used to collect data for the survey. Expected values include date, dateTime, dateTimeStamp.

fields.name: visitOrgs
fields.title: Visit Orgs
fields.description: The names of the organisations responsible for recording the original Occurrence.
fields.example: NSW Dept of Planning, Industry and Environment.

fields.name: visitObservers
fields.title: Visit Observers
fields.description: A list (concatenated and separated using |) of names of people, groups, or organisations responsible for recording the original Occurrence.
fields.example: Oliver P. Pearson | Anita K. Pearson

fields.name: condition
fields.title: Condition
fields.description: The state of a patch of vegetation at the time of sampling relative to some specified standard or benchmark (where available).

fields.name: targetTaxonomicScope
fields.title: Target Taxonomic Scope
fields.description: The taxonomic group targeted for sampling during the Site Visit

fields.name: protocolName
fields.title: Protocol Name
fields.description: Categorical descriptive name for the method used during the Site Visit.

fields.name: protocolDescription
fields.title: Protocol Description
fields.description: A detailed description of the method used during the Site Visit. The description may include deviations from a protocol referred to in eco:protocolReferences. Recommended good practice is to provide information about instruments used, calibration, etc.
fields.example: Three conventional harp traps (3.2m ht x 2.2m w) were established in flight path zones for a period of 4 hrs at dawn and dusk for a total of 10 trap nights. Traps were visited on an hourly basis during each deployment period and the trap catch recorded for species, size, weight, sex, age and maternal status.

fields.name: samplingEffortValue
fields.title: Sample Effort
fields.description: Similar to eco:samplingEffortValue. The total sampling effort value. A samplingEffortValue must have a corresponding samplingEffortUnit

fields.name: samplingEffortUnit
fields.title: Sampling Effort Units
fields.description: Similar to eco:samplingEffortUnit. The units associated with samplingEffortValue.
